Uses of Class
asteroids.Vector

  • Packages that use Vector 
    Package Description
    asteroids  

    • Uses of Vector in asteroids

      Subclasses of Vector in asteroids 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Direction
      A class for storing information on the orientation of the spaceship.
      class  Position
      A class implementing simple positional information in two dimensions for objects in the game.
      class  Velocity
      A class of velocities involving an x-component, and an y-component, that is able to compute everything necessary to implement velocities.
      Methods in asteroids that return Vector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector Vector.getDifference(Vector v)
      Subtracts a given vector from this vector and returns the result as a new vector.
      Vector Vector.getSum(Vector v)
      Adds a given vector to this vector and returns the result as a new vector.
      Vector Vector.GetUnitVectorInSameDirection()
      Returns a unit vector denoting the direction of the vector.
      Vector Vector.scaleBy(double scalar)
      Scales this vector by a given factor.
      Methods in asteroids with parameters of type Vector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Angle Vector.angleTo(Vector v)
      Calculates the angle between this vector and a given vector.
      double Vector.distanceTo(Vector v)
      Computes the Euclidean distance between this vector and a given vector.
      double Vector.dotProduct(Vector v)
      Returns the inner product of this vector and a given vector.
      Vector Vector.getDifference(Vector v)
      Subtracts a given vector from this vector and returns the result as a new vector.
      Position Position.getSum(Vector v) 
      Vector Vector.getSum(Vector v)
